Package com.service

Interface AccountDAOI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountDAO
    public interface AccountDAOI
    This is a DAO interface to implements CRUD operations for objects of Account class
    Version:
    1.0.
    Author:
    Victor Zenin
    See Also:
    BankDAOI, CustomerDAOI, PaymentDAOI, BankDAO, CustomerDAO, PaymentDAO, AccountDAO

      • updateAccount

        void updateAccount​(int account_ID,
                   Account newAccount)
        update a existing account of bank in the application

        Balance of account cannot be changed using this method - updateAccount()

        Parameters:
        account_ID - ID of account
        newAccount - an new account of bank in the application
